name: Figurality
description:
You play as the hero of the figures! He creates balance in the world and does not allow chaos to penetrate our universe! It is he who chooses the right figures that creates stability!

Figurality - A game with a choice of actions, by controlling the mouse cursor you must guide it to the correct figure before you hit the wall, the further you progress the more difficult the figures become.

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Choice of difficulty level
- Reaction Training
